name: InstallShield Express 2 Project File
summary: Learn about .IWZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: InstallShield Express was a simplified version of the full InstallShield tool. Developers used IWZ files in older versions of InstallShield Express from the early 2000s to organize and save the setup process for their software so they could compile it into an installer. Modern versions of InstallShield no longer use IWZ files, making them obscure.

instructions: You can open IWZ files with Flexera InstallShield Express 2. Later versions of the software do not support IWZ files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
